original_text: But Moses said to the people of Gad and to the people of Reuben, “Shall your brothers go to the war while you sit here?
korean_text: 모세가 갓 자손과 르우벤 자손에게 이르되 너희 형제들은 싸우러 가거늘 너희는 여기 앉아 있고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: But Moses said to the people of Gad and to the people of Reuben
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모세는 갓 지파와 르우벤 지파에게 말하였습니다

sentences.original_text: Shall your brothers go to the war
